requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #1 API Trace

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

requestBody.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

resultPayload.note: Step skipped: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

evidence.error: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Track scheduled hours per employee". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
data.failureMessage: Exploratory validation step skipped by deterministic runner (semantic/manual review step).

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
